page.title: 16Local industry in Ilford.
page.content: My{parent's business}is making "Jeans" for work and for fashion, and{selling them.{Jeans}come in different styles and fabric. They use course cotton or 'cord' or comfortable stretchy fabric. Levis Strauss was the original creator of jeans and we sell his make and others like "Wranglers. Prices range from Â£17 for working jeans to more than Â£3O for{fashion}jeans like "Pepe" or "Fiourouchi" but some of these may be out of fashion in a few years. Jeans can be styled with up to five pockets, be plain or have pleats in front: they can be loose or fit skin tight. There are three colours; the natural blue, stone-wash where pumice stones wash some of the blue out and bleached white. Styles can change at any time due to public demand. Mayur Shah, 4th Year, Loxford High School.
